First, it's important to note that the grandchild mentioned having "recently started experiencing some loss of hearing." I should also consider if there's any ambiguity in the question. It says the grandchild "asked for a seat in the front" because of their loss of hearing. The 70-year-old didn't express any issues with hearing but agreed to support the grandchild, possibly because they care about their health or well-being.

</think>

The grandchild is hearing impaired.
